name: Chain (itch) (Peter Yu)
description:
A simple click game that earns scores by simply clicking two or more connected balls.

If the game size is not suitable, please try full-screen mode by clicking the right top icon.

Inspired by the Windows game named 連鎖反應

Github source code: Chain

Blog post: [Web]小遊戲 – 連鎖反應

Music material:

  • GameSounds.xyz
  • 小森平的免費下載音效
